entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
